```js
class PersistentSearchBoxExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: "", results: [] };
  }

  handleChange(e) {
    this.setState({ value: e.target.value });
  }

  handleClear() {
    this.setState({ value: "" });
  }

  handleFetch(value) {
    // Fake some results
    this.setState({
      results: [
        ...Array(value.length)
          .fill(null)
          .map((u, index) => `Result ${index + 1}`)
      ]
    });
  }

  handleBack() {
    this.setState({ results: [] });
  }

  handleClick(value, index) {
    this.setState({ value });
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <PersistentSearchBox
        label="Search for something"
        value={this.state.value}
        results={this.state.results}
        onChange={e => {
          this.handleChange(e);
        }}
        onClear={() => {
          this.handleClear();
        }}
        onFetch={value => {
          this.handleFetch(value);
        }}
        onBack={() => {
          this.handleBack();
        }}
        onClick={(value, index) => {
          this.handleClick(value, index);
        }}
      />
    );
  }
}

<PersistentSearchBoxExample />;
```
